# Section 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import the dataset.

```{r}

```
```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("./data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c(".", "NA", ""))

litters_df = 
    janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

pups_df = 
  read_csv("./data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv", na = c(".", "NA", ""))

pups_df = 
    janitor::clean_names(pups_df)

```

```{r}
select(litters_df, group, litter_number, gd0_weight)
```


```{r}
select(pups_df, sex, litter_number, pd_ears)
```

```{r}
select(pups_df, sex == 1)
select(pups_df, pd_walk < 11, sex == 2)
```
```{r}
pups_df = 
      read_csv("./data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv", skip = 3, na = c("NA", ".", "")) |> 
      janitor::clean_names() |> 
      filter(sex==1) |> 
      select(-pd_ears) |> 
      mutate(pd_pivot_ge7 = pd_pivot >=7)
```
